title: Claimant average weekly work hours (optional)
avgWeeklyHrsLabel: Average weekly work hours provided on ET1
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

et3ResponseClaimantWeeklyHours.label: Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?

et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.label: What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)
et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.hint: Enter the claimant’s average hours worked each week in digits.

et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.invalid: The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.exceeded: The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
